text:
@q5123 
Well, if you like very traditional RPGs, you'll love this one. Can't be more traditional than it is. And also, I found the game extremely easy. Didn't die once and pretty much eradicated everything in my path. Didn't do the extra dungeons though.

text: The only problem that I sometimes come across is when after you beat the game, those extra quests just don't feel worth it. In my opinion, that's how FFXIII was to me. Now I may some day go back and do those other crystal quests and attempt to kill some Long Gui's, but I'm not feeling it.
